summary.span: 将 对象从一种类型转换成另一种类型。

span.span: Converts objects from one type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，类型转换器用于将转换实例与及其相应的字符串表示形式。Most commonly, the type converter is used to convert instances to and from their corresponding string representations. 访问类通过。Access the class through the .
